APIListChunking.description: Enable the API clients to retrieve (`LIST` or `GET`) resources from API server in chunks.
APIListChunking.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 API 客户端以分块的方式从 API 服务器读取（`LIST` 或 `GET`）资源。

APIPriorityAndFairness.description: Enable managing request concurrency with prioritization and fairness at each server. (Renamed from `RequestManagement`)
APIPriorityAndFairness.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 API 服务器上基于请求的优先级和公平性来管理请求的并发度。（原名 `RequestManagement`）。

APIResponseCompression.description: Compress the API responses for `LIST` or `GET` requests.
APIResponseCompression.x-kab-description-zh: 为 `LIST` 和 `GET` 请求压缩 API 响应数据。

APISelfSubjectReview.description: Enables API to get self subject attributes after authentication.
APISelfSubjectReview.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 API 请求端在完成身份认证之后读取与自身主体属性相关的信息。

APIServerIdentity.description: Assign each API server an ID in a cluster.
APIServerIdentity.x-kab-description-zh: 为集群中的每个 API 服务器赋予一个标识符（ID）。

APIServerTracing.description: Enable distributed tracing in the API server.
APIServerTracing.x-kab-description-zh: 在 API 服务器上启用分布式跟踪支持。

APIServingWithRoutine.description: Enables expression validation in admission control.
APIServingWithRoutine.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在准入控制操作中启用表达式合法性检查。

Accelerators.description: Enable Nvidia GPU support when using Docker.
Accelerators.x-kab-description-zh: 在使用 Docker 作为容器运行时的时候启用 Nvidia GPU 支持。

AdmissionWebhookMatchConditions.description: Enables usage of matchConditions fields to use CEL expressions for matching on admission webhooks.
AdmissionWebhookMatchConditions.x-kab-description-zh: 在对准入 Webhook 进行匹配时允许在 matchConditions 字段中使用 CEL 表达式。

AffinityInAnnotations.x-kab-description-zh: 允许设置 [Pod 亲和性或反亲和性](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/assign-pod-node/#affinity-and-anti-affinity)。

AggregatedDiscoveryEndpoint.description: Enable a single HTTP endpoint `/discovery/<version>` which supports native HTTP caching with ETags containing all APIResources known to the API server.
AggregatedDiscoveryEndpoint.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 `/discovery/<version>` 这一 HTTP 端点，从而支持通过包含 API 服务器所了解的所有资源的 ETags 来构造原生的 HTTP 高速缓存。

AllowExtTrafficLocalEndpoints.description: Enable a service to route external requests to node local endpoints.
AllowExtTrafficLocalEndpoints.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 Service 将外部服务请求路由到节点本地的端点。

AllowInsecureBackendProxy.description: Enable the users to skip TLS verification of kubelets on Pod log requests.
AllowInsecureBackendProxy.x-kab-description-zh: 允许用户在读取 Pod 日志时略过 kubelet 上的 TLS 检查。

AllowServiceLBStatusOnNonLB.description: Enables `.status.ingress.loadBalancer` to be set on Services of types other than `LoadBalancer`.
AllowServiceLBStatusOnNonLB.x-kab-description-zh: 允许为类型不是 `LoadBalancer` 的 Service 设置 `.status.ingress.loadBalancer` 状态字段。

AnyVolumeDataSource.description: Enable use of any custom resource as the `dataSource` of PersistentVolumeClaim.
AnyVolumeDataSource.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将任何自定义的数据源设置为 PersistentVolumeClaim 的 `dataSource` 属性。

AppArmor.description: Enable AppArmor based mandatory access control on Linux nodes when using Docker.
AppArmor.x-kab-description-zh: 在 Linux 系统上使用 Docker 来运行负载时，允许使用基于 AppArmor 的自主访问控制。

AppArmorFields.description: Enable AppArmor related security context settings.
AppArmorFields.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 SecurityContext 中设置与 AppArmor 相关的字段。

AttachVolumeLimit.description: Enable volume plugins to report limits on number of volumes that can be attached to a node.
AttachVolumeLimit.x-kab-description-zh: 允许插件报告其在给定节点上能够挂接的卷的个数上限。

BalanceAttachedNodeVolumes.description: Include volume count on node to be considered for balanced resource allocation while scheduling. A node which has closer CPU, memory utilization, and volume count is favored by the scheduler while making decisions.
BalanceAttachedNodeVolumes.x-kab-description-zh: 在调度 Pod 时，处于负载均衡的目的考虑各个节点上的卷数目。在给出调度决策时会有限选择 CPU、内存和卷数目比较接近的节点。

BlockVolume.description: Enable the definition and consumption of raw block devices in Pods. See [Raw Block Volume Support](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/#raw-block-volume-support) for more details.
BlockVolume.x-kab-description-zh: 启用在 Pod 中定义和使用原生块设备的能力。参阅[原生块卷支持](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/#raw-block-volume-support)。

BoundServiceAccountTokenVolume.description: Migrate ServiceAccount volumes to use a projected volume consisting of a ServiceAccountTokenVolumeProjection. Cluster admins can use metric `serviceaccount_stale_tokens_total` to monitor workloads that are depending on the extended tokens. If there are no such workloads, turn off extended tokens by starting `kube-apiserver` with flag `--service-account-extend-token-expiration=false`.
BoundServiceAccountTokenVolume.x-kab-description-zh: 将 ServiceAccount 卷迁移为包含 ServiceAccountTokenVolumeProjection 的投射卷。集群管理员可以使用指标`serviceaccount_stale_tokens_total` 来监测依赖于扩展令牌的负载个数。如果集群中不存在此类负载，可以在启动 `kube-apiserver` 时设置参数 `--service-account-extend-token-expiration=false` 来关闭扩展令牌能力。

CPUManager.description: Enable container level CPU affinity support, see [CPU Management Policies](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/cpu-management-policies/) for more details.
CPUManager.x-kab-description-zh: 启用容器级别的 CPU 亲和性支持，相关细节可参阅 [CPU 管理策略](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/cpu-management-policies/)。

CPUManagerPolicyAlphaOptions.description: This allows fine-tuning of CPUManager policies, experimental, Alpha-quality options This feature gate will guard *a group* of CPUManager options whose quality level is Alpha. This feature gate will never graduate to Beta or Stable.
CPUManagerPolicyAlphaOptions.x-kab-description-zh: 此门控用来启用对 CPUManager 策略的微调，具体是针对实验性质、Alpha 阶段的选项。此门控用来保护一些处于 Alpha 阶段的 CPUManager 策略选项，因此这一门控永远不会进阶到 Beta 或 GA 阶段。

CPUManagerPolicyBetaOptions.description: This allows fine-tuning of CPUManager policies, experimental, Beta-quality options This feature gate will guard *a group* of CPUManager options whose quality level is Beta. This feature gate will never graduate to stable.
CPUManagerPolicyBetaOptions.x-kab-description-zh: 此门控用来启用对 CPUManager 策略的微调，具体是针对实验性质、Beta 阶段的选项。此门控用来保护一些处于 Beta 阶段的 CPUManager 策略选项，因此这一门控永远不会进阶到 GA 阶段。

CPUManagerPolicyOptions.x-kab-description-zh: 允许对 CPUManager 的策略进行微调。

CRDValidationRatcheting.description: Ignores errors raised on unchanged fields of custom resources across UPDATE/PATCH requests.
CRDValidationRatcheting.x-kab-description-zh: 在处理 UPDATE、PATCH 请求时，忽略与自定义资源上未变更字段相关的错误信息。

CRIContainerLogRotation.description: Enable container log rotation for CRI container runtime. The default max size of a log file is 10MB and the default max number of log files allowed for a container is 5. These values can be configured in the kubelet config. See the [logging at node level](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/cluster-administration/logging/#logging-at-the-node-level) documentation for more details.
CRIContainerLogRotation.x-kab-description-zh: 针对 CRI 容器运行时启用容器日志轮换特性。日志文件的默认尺寸上限为 10 MB，并且每个容器最多允许对应 5 个日志文件。这里的阈值可以在 kubelet 配置文件中调整。相关细节可参阅[节点机别的日志生成](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/cluster-administration/logging/#logging-at-the-node-level)。

CSIBlockVolume.description: Enable external CSI volume drivers to support block storage.
CSIBlockVolume.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用外部 CSI 卷驱动来提供块存储。

CSIDriverRegistry.description: Enable all logic related to the CSIDriver API object in `csi.storage.k8s.io`.
CSIDriverRegistry.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 `csi.storage.k8s.io` 组中 CSIDriver API 对象相关的所有逻辑。

CSIInlineVolume.description: Enable CSI Inline volumes support for Pods.
CSIInlineVolume.x-kab-description-zh: 为 Pod 启用 CSI 内联卷（Inlined Volume）支持。

CSIMigration.description: Enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from in-tree plugins to corresponding pre-installed CSI plugins.
CSIMigration.x-kab-description-zh: 启用卷操作的封装与翻译逻辑，将树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）相关的卷操作翻译为对应的、预先安装的 CSI 插件。

CSIMigrationAWS.description: Enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the AWS-EBS in-tree plugin to EBS CSI plugin. Supports falling back to in-tree EBS plugin if a node does not have EBS CSI plugin installed and configured. Requires `CSIMigration` feature flag enabled.
CSIMigrationAWS.x-kab-description-zh: 启用卷操作的封装与翻译逻辑，将 AWS-EBS 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）相关的卷操作翻译为对应的、预先安装的 EBS CSI 插件。如果节点上没有安装或没有配置 EBS CSI 插件，支持回退到使用树内插件。需要启用 `CSIMigration` 特性。

CSIMigrationAWSComplete.description: Stops registering the EBS in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers and enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the AWS-EBS in-tree plugin to EBS CSI plugin.  Requires CSIMigration and CSIMigrationAWS feature flags enabled and EBS CSI plugin installed and configured on all nodes in the cluster.
CSIMigrationAWSComplete.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 中注册 AWS-EBS 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin），并将相关的卷操作通过封装或翻译逻辑转换为对 EBS CSI 插件的操作。要求集群中所有节点上都安装且配置了 EBS CSI 插件，并且启用 `CSIMigration` 与 `CSIMigrationAWS` 特性。

CSIMigrationAzureDisk.description: Enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the Azure-Disk in-tree plugin to AzureDisk CSI plugin.  Supports falling back to in-tree AzureDisk plugin if a node does not have AzureDisk CSI plugin installed and configured. Requires the `CSIMigration` feature flag enabled.
CSIMigrationAzureDisk.x-kab-description-zh: 启用卷操作的封装与翻译逻辑，将 AzureDisk 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）相关的卷操作转换为对 AzureDisk CSI 插件的操作。如果某节点上没有安装或没有配置 AzureDisk CSI 插件，支持回退到使用树内插件。需要启用 `CSIMigration` 特性。

CSIMigrationAzureDiskComplete.description: Stops registering the Azure-Disk in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers and enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the Azure-Disk in-tree plugin to AzureDisk CSI plugin. Requires CSIMigration and CSIMigrationAzureDisk feature flags enabled and AzureDisk CSI plugin installed and configured on all nodes in the cluster.
CSIMigrationAzureDiskComplete.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 中注册 AzureDisk 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）与卷控制器，并将相关的卷操作通过封装或翻译逻辑转换为对 AzureDisk CSI 插件的操作。要求集群中所有节点上都安装且配置了 AzureDisk CSI 插件，并且启用 `CSIMigration` 与 `CSIMigrationAzureDisk` 特性。

CSIMigrationAzureFile.description: Enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the Azure-File in-tree plugin to AzureFile CSI plugin.  Supports falling back to in-tree AzureFile plugin if a node does not have AzureFile CSI plugin installed and configured. Requires the `CSIMigration` feature flag enabled.
CSIMigrationAzureFile.x-kab-description-zh: 启用卷操作的封装与翻译逻辑，将 AzureFile 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）相关的卷操作转换为对 AzureFile CSI 插件的操作。如果某节点上没有安装或没有配置 AzureFile CSI 插件，支持回退到使用树内插件。需要启用 `CSIMigration` 特性。

CSIMigrationAzureFileComplete.description: Stops registering the Azure-File in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers and enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the Azure-File in-tree plugin to AzureFile CSI plugin. Requires CSIMigration and CSIMigrationAzureFile feature flags  enabled and AzureFile CSI plugin installed and configured on all nodes in the cluster.
CSIMigrationAzureFileComplete.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 中注册 AzureFile 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）与卷控制器，并将相关的卷操作通过封装或翻译逻辑转换为对 AzureFile CSI 插件的操作。要求集群中所有节点上都安装且配置了 AzureFile CSI 插件，并且启用 `CSIMigration` 与 `CSIMigrationAzureFile` 特性。

CSIMigrationGCE.description: Enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the GCE-PD in-tree plugin to PD CSI plugin. Supports falling back to in-tree GCE plugin if a node does not have PD CSI plugin installed and configured. Requires the `CSIMigration` feature flag enabled.
CSIMigrationGCE.x-kab-description-zh: 启用卷操作的封装与翻译逻辑，将 GCE-PD 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）相关的卷操作转换为对 GCE PD CSI 插件的操作。如果某节点上没有安装或没有配置 PD CSI 插件，支持回退到使用树内插件。需要启用 `CSIMigration` 特性。

CSIMigrationGCEComplete.description: Stops registering the GCE-PD in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers and enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the GCE-PD in-tree plugin to PD CSI plugin.  Requires CSIMigration and CSIMigrationGCE feature flags enabled and PD CSI plugin installed and configured on all nodes in the cluster.
CSIMigrationGCEComplete.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 中注册 GCE PD 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）与卷控制器，并将相关的卷操作通过封装或翻译逻辑转换为对 GCE PD CSI 插件的操作。要求集群中所有节点上都安装且配置了 GCE PD CSI 插件，并且启用 `CSIMigration` 与 `CSIMigrationGCE` 特性。

CSIMigrationOpenStack.description: Enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the Cinder in-tree plugin to Cinder CSI plugin. Supports falling back to in-tree Cinder plugin if a node does not have Cinder CSI plugin installed and configured. Requires the `CSIMigration` feature flag enabled.
CSIMigrationOpenStack.x-kab-description-zh: 启用卷操作的封装与翻译逻辑，将 Cinder 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）相关的卷操作转换为对 Cinder CSI 插件的操作。如果某节点上没有安装或没有配置 Cinder CSI 插件，支持回退到使用树内插件。需要启用 `CSIMigration` 特性。

CSIMigrationOpenStackComplete.description: Stops registering the Cinder in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers and enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the Cinder in-tree plugin to Cinder CSI plugin.  Requires CSIMigration and CSIMigrationOpenStack feature flags enabled and Cinder CSI plugin installed and configured on all nodes in the cluster.
CSIMigrationOpenStackComplete.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 中注册 Cinder 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）与卷控制器，并将相关的卷操作通过封装或翻译逻辑转换为对 Cinder CSI 插件的操作。要求集群中所有节点上都安装且配置了 Cinder CSI 插件，并且启用 `CSIMigration` 与 `CSIMigrationOpenStack` 特性。

CSIMigrationPortworx.description: Stops registering the Portworx in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers and enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the Portworx in-tree plugin to its CSI plugin. Requires CSIMigration and CSIMigrationPortworx feature flags enabled and Portworx CSI plugin installed and configured on all nodes in the cluster.
CSIMigrationPortworx.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 中注册 Portworx 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）与卷控制器，并将相关的卷操作通过封装或翻译逻辑转换为对 Portworx CSI 插件的操作。要求集群中所有节点上都安装且配置了 Portworx CSI 插件，并且启用 `CSIMigration` 与 `CSIMigrationPortworx` 特性。

CSIMigrationRBD.description: Stops registering the RBD in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers and enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the RBD in-tree plugin to its CSI plugin. Requires CSIMigration and CSIMigrationRBD feature flags enabled and RBD CSI plugin installed and configured on all nodes in the cluster.
CSIMigrationRBD.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 中注册 RBD 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）与卷控制器，并将相关的卷操作通过封装或翻译逻辑转换为对 RBD CSI 插件的操作。要求集群中所有节点上都安装且配置了 RBD CSI 插件，并且启用 `CSIMigration` 与 `CSIMigrationRBD` 特性。

CSIMigrationvSphere.description: Enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the vSphere in-tree plugin to vSphere CSI plugin.  Supports falling back to in-tree vSphere plugin if a node does not have vSphere CSI plugin installed and configured. Requires `CSIMigration` feature flag enabled.
CSIMigrationvSphere.x-kab-description-zh: 启用卷操作的封装与翻译逻辑，将 vSphere 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）相关的卷操作转换为对 vSphere CSI 插件的操作。如果某节点上没有安装或没有配置 vSphere CSI 插件，支持回退到使用树内插件。需要启用 `CSIMigration` 特性。

CSIMigrationvSphereComplete.description: Stops registering the vSphere in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers and enables shims and translation logic to route volume operations from the vSphere in-tree plugin to vSphere CSI plugin. Requires CSIMigration and CSIMigrationvSphere feature flags enabled and vSphere CSI plugin installed and configured on all nodes in the cluster.
CSIMigrationvSphereComplete.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 中注册 vSphere 树内插件（In-Tree Plugin）与卷控制器，并将相关的卷操作通过封装或翻译逻辑转换为对 vSphere CSI 插件的操作。要求集群中所有节点上都安装且配置了 vSphere CSI 插件，并且启用 `CSIMigration` 与 `CSIMigrationvSphere` 特性。

CSINodeExpandSecret.description: Enable passing secret authentication data to a CSI driver for use during a `NodeExpandVolume` CSI operation.
CSINodeExpandSecret.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将机密的身份认证数据传递给 CSI 驱动，以便后者在执行 `NodeExpandVolume` 操作时使用。

CSINodeInfo.description: Enable all logic related to the CSINodeInfo API object in `csi.storage.k8s.io`.
CSINodeInfo.x-kab-description-zh: 启用与 `csi.storage.k8s.io` 组中 CSINodeInfo API 对象相关的所有逻辑。

CSIPersistentVolume.description: Enable discovering and mounting volumes provisioned through a Container Storage Interface(CSI) compatible volume plugin.
CSIPersistentVolume.x-kab-description-zh: 允许发现、挂载通过与容器存储接口（Container Storage Interface，CSI）兼容的卷插件所制备的卷。

CSIServiceAccountToken.description: Enable CSI drivers to receive the pods' service account token that they mount volumes for.
CSIServiceAccountToken.x-kab-description-zh: 对于挂载了服务账号令牌卷的 Pod，允许 CSI 驱动接收 Pod 的服务账号令牌数据。

CSIStorageCapacity.description: Enables CSI drivers to publish storage capacity information and the Kubernetes scheduler to use that information when scheduling Pods.
CSIStorageCapacity.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 CSI 驱动发布存储容量信息，从而使得 Kubernetes 调度器在调度 Pod 时能够使用这些信息。

CSIVolumeFSGroupPolicy.description: Allows CSIDrivers to use the `fsGroupPolicy` field.  This field controls whether volumes created by a CSIDriver support volume ownership and permission modifications when these volumes are mounted.
CSIVolumeFSGroupPolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 CSIDriver 使用 `fsGroupPolicy` 字段。该字段控制 CSIDriver 所创建的卷是否在被挂载之后能够支持卷属主和访问权限变更。

CSIVolumeHealth.description: Enable support for CSI volume health monitoring on node.
CSIVolumeHealth.x-kab-description-zh: 允许对节点上的 CSI 卷进行健康监测。

CSRDuration.description: Allows clients to request a duration for certificates issued via the Kubernetes CSR API.
CSRDuration.x-kab-description-zh: 允许客户端为通过 Kubernetes CSR API 发放的整数请求有效期限。

CloudControllerManagerWebhook.description: Enable webhooks in cloud controller manager.
CloudControllerManagerWebhook.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在云控制器管理器中调用 Webhook。

CloudDualStackNodeIPs.description: Enables dual-stack `--node-ip` in kubelet with external cloud providers.
CloudDualStackNodeIPs.x-kab-description-zh: 对于使用外部云驱动的 kubelet，启用双栈的 `--node-ip` 设置。

ClusterTrustBundle.description: Enable ClusterTrustBundle objects and Kubelet integration.
ClusterTrustBundle.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 ClusterTrustBundle 对象及其与 kubelet 之间的集成。

ClusterTrustBundleProjection.description: Enable ClusterTrustBundle Kubelet projected volumes. Depends on the `ClusterTrustBundle` gate.
ClusterTrustBundleProjection.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 ClusterTrustBundle kubelet 投射卷。要求启用 `ClusterTrustBundle` 特性门控。

ComponentSLIs.description: Enables the support to component level SLI metrics.
ComponentSLIs.x-kab-description-zh: 启用对组件级别 SLI 度量值的支持。

ConfigurableFSGroupPolicy.description: Allows user to configure volume permission change policy for fsGroups when mounting a volume in a Pod.
ConfigurableFSGroupPolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 允许用户配置在 Pod 中挂载卷时对 fsGroups 相关卷访问权限的变更策略。

ConsistentHTTPGetHandlers.description: Normalize HTTP get URL and Header passing for lifecycle handlers with probers.
ConsistentHTTPGetHandlers.x-kab-description-zh: 对 HTTP GET URL 和标头字段的传递作规格化处理，进而支持带有探测机制的生命周期处理逻辑。

ConsistentListFromCache.description: Allow the API server to serve consistent lists from cache.
ConsistentListFromCache.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 API 服务器通过缓存来为一致性列表请求提供服务。

ContainerCheckpoint.description: Enables container Checkpoint support in the kubelet.
ContainerCheckpoint.x-kab-description-zh: 在 kubelet 层面启用容器检查点（Checkpoint）操作支持。

ContextualLogging.description: When you enable this feature gate, Kubernetes components that support contextual logging add extra detail to log output.
ContextualLogging.x-kab-description-zh: 启用此特性门控时，支持上下文日志输出的 Kubernetes 组件会向日志输出中添加一些额外的细节信息。

ControllerManagerLeaderMigration.x-kab-description-zh: 为 `kube-controller-manager` 和 `cloud-controller-manager` 启用领导者迁移处理。

CronJobControllerV2.description: Use an alternative implementation of the CronJob controller. Otherwise, version 1 of the same controller is selected.  The version 2 controller provides experimental performance improvements.
CronJobControllerV2.x-kab-description-zh: 使用 CronJob 控制器的一种替代实现。如果不启用此门控，则使用同一控制器的 V1 版本。V2 版本控制器提供一些实验性质的性能改进。

CronJobTimeZone.description: Allow the use of the `timeZone` optional field in CronJobs.
CronJobTimeZone.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 CronJob 资源中使用 `timeZone` 可选字段。

CronJobsScheduledAnnotation.description: Set the scheduled time as an annotation on a CronJob.
CronJobsScheduledAnnotation.x-kab-description-zh: 将 CronJob 的排期时间已注解的方式标注到 CronJob 上。

CrossNamespaceVolumeDataSource.description: Enable the usage of cross namespace volume data source to allow you to specify a source namespace in the `dataSourceRef` field of a PersistentVolumeClaim.
CrossNamespaceVolumeDataSource.x-kab-description-zh: 针对 PersistentVolumeClaim 的 `dataSourceRef` 字段，允许设置来源名字空间，进而启用跨名字空间的卷数据源设置。

CustomCPUCFSQuotaPeriod.description: Enable nodes to change `cpuCFSQuotaPeriod` in kubelet config file.
CustomCPUCFSQuotaPeriod.x-kab-description-zh: 允许节点在其 kubelet 配置文件中变更 `cpuCFSQuotaPeriod` 设置。

CustomPodDNS.description: Enable customizing the DNS settings for a Pod using its `dnsConfig` property.
CustomPodDNS.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Pod 中通过其 `dnsConfig` 属性对 DNS 配置进行定制。

CustomResourceDefaulting.description: Enable CRD support for default values in OpenAPI v3 validation schemas.
CustomResourceDefaulting.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 CRD 在其 OpenAPI v3 合法性检查模式中指定属性默认值。

CustomResourceFieldSelectors.description: Enable CustomResourceDefinitions to include selectable fields which can then be used as field selectors.
CustomResourceFieldSelectors.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 CRD 包含可选择的字段，进而允许将这些字段作为字段选择算符来使用。

CustomResourcePublishOpenAPI.description: Enables publishing of CRD OpenAPI specs.
CustomResourcePublishOpenAPI.x-kab-description-zh: 允许为 CRD 发布其 OpenAPI 定义规范。

CustomResourceSubresources.description: Enable `/status` and `/scale` subresources on resources created from a CustomResourceDefinition.
CustomResourceSubresources.x-kab-description-zh: 为使用 CRD 创建的资源启用 `/status` 和 `/scale` 子资源。

CustomResourceValidation.description: Enable schema based validation on resources created from a CustomResourceDefinition.
CustomResourceValidation.x-kab-description-zh: 为使用 CRD 创建的资源启用基于模式的合法性检查。

CustomResourceValidationExpressions.description: Enable expression language validation in CRD which will validate customer resource based on validation rules written in `x-kubernetes-validations` extension.
CustomResourceValidationExpressions.x-kab-description-zh: 支持在 CRD 中设置表达式语言合法性检查，基于在 `x-kubernetes-validations` 扩展中写入的规则对自定义资源进行合法性检查。

CustomResourceWebhookConversion.description: Enable webhook-based conversion on resources created from a CustomResourceDefinition.
CustomResourceWebhookConversion.x-kab-description-zh: 对基于 CRD 创建的资源启用 Webhook 形式的转换处理。

DaemonSetUpdateSurge.description: Enables the DaemonSet workloads to maintain availability during update per node.
DaemonSetUpdateSurge.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 DaemonSet 负载在逐节点执行更新操作期间维持可用性。

DefaultHostNetworkHostPortsInPodTemplate.description: Changes when the default value of `PodSpec.containers[].ports[].hostPort` is assigned. The default is to only set a default value in Pods. Enabling this means a default will be assigned even to embedded PodSpecs (e.g. in a Deployment), which is the historical default.
DefaultHostNetworkHostPortsInPodTemplate.x-kab-description-zh: 此门控更改 `PodSpec.containers[].ports[].hostPort` 字段的赋值时机。默认情况下，只会在 Pod 层面设置默认值。启用此门控则意味着会在嵌套的 Pod 规约（例如 Deployment 资源）中也会做默认值赋值处理 ——这是之前的默认行为。

DefaultPodTopologySpread.description: Enables the use of `PodTopologySpread` scheduling plugin to do default spreading.
DefaultPodTopologySpread.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 `PodTopologySpread` 调度插件来执行默认的 Pod 分布处理。

DelegateFSGroupToCSIDriver.description: If supported by the CSI driver, delegates the role of applying `fsGroup` from a Pod's `securityContext` to the driver by passing `fsGroup` through the NodeStageVolume and NodePublishVolume CSI calls.
DelegateFSGroupToCSIDriver.x-kab-description-zh: 如果 CSI 驱动支持，则通过 NodeStageVolume 和 NodePublishVolume CSI 调用将 `fsGroup` 传递给 CSI 驱动，以便将应用 Pod 中 `securityContext` 的 `fsGroup` 的操作交给 CSI 驱动来实现。

DevicePluginCDIDevices.description: Enable support to CDI device IDs in the DevicePlugin API.
DevicePluginCDIDevices.x-kab-description-zh: 在 DevicePlugin API 中启用对 CDI 设备标识符的支持。

DevicePlugins.description: Enable the [device-plugins](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/extend-kubernetes/compute-storage-net/device-plugins/) based resource provisioning on nodes.
DevicePlugins.x-kab-description-zh: 在节点上启用基于[设备插件](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/extend-kubernetes/compute-storage-net/device-plugins/) 的资源制备机制。

DisableAcceleratorUsageMetrics.description: Disable accelerator metrics collected by the kubelet.
DisableAcceleratorUsageMetrics.x-kab-description-zh: 禁止使用 kubelet 所搜集的加速器度量值数据。

DisableCloudProviders.description: Disables any functionality in 'kube-apiserver', 'kube-controller-manager' and 'kubelet' related to the '--cloud-provider' component flag.
DisableCloudProviders.x-kab-description-zh: 禁止 `kube-apiserver`、`kube-controller-manager` 和 `kubelet` 中与 `--cloud-provider` 组件标志相关的所有功能特性。

DisableKubeletCloudCredentialProviders.description: Disable the in-tree functionality in kubelet to authenticate to a cloud provider container registry for image pull credentials.
DisableKubeletCloudCredentialProviders.x-kab-description-zh: 禁止 `kubelet` 内部与云平台容器镜像库间就镜像拉取凭据作身份认证的功能。

DisableNodeKubeProxyVersion.x-kab-description-zh: 禁止 `v1.Node` 中的 `status.nodeInfo.kubeProxyVersion` 字段。

DownwardAPIHugePages.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在[下行 API](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/inject-data-application/downward-api-volume-expose-pod-information) 中使用巨页（hugepages）。

DryRun.description: Enable server-side [dry run](https://k8s.io/docs/reference/using-api/api-concepts/#dry-run) requests so that validation, merging, and mutation can be tested without committing.
DryRun.x-kab-description-zh: 启用服务器端[试运行](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/reference/using-api/api-concepts/#dry-run)请求，从而使得 API 请求能够被检查、合并和变更，但不必提交到持久性存储中。

DynamicAuditing.x-kab-description-zh: 用来启用动态审计能力。

DynamicKubeletConfig.description: Enable the dynamic configuration of kubelet. See [Reconfigure kubelet](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/reconfigure-kubelet/) for more details.
DynamicKubeletConfig.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 kubelet 对动态配置的支持。相关细节可参阅[重新配置 kubelet](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/reconfigure-kubelet/)。

DynamicProvisioningScheduling.description: Extend the default scheduler to be aware of volume topology and handle PV provisioning.  This feature is superseded by the `VolumeScheduling` feature completely in v1.12.
DynamicProvisioningScheduling.x-kab-description-zh: 扩展默认的调度器，使之能够感知卷拓扑结构，处理 PV 卷的制备。此特性在 v1.12 中被 `VolumeScheduling` 特性替换。

DynamicResourceAllocation.description: Enables support for resources with custom parameters and a lifecycle that is independent of a Pod.
DynamicResourceAllocation.x-kab-description-zh: 允许支持带有自定义参数并且生命周期与 Pod 独立的资源。

DynamicVolumeProvisioning.description: Enable the [dynamic provisioning](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/dynamic-provisioning/) of persistent volumes to Pods.
DynamicVolumeProvisioning.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 Pod 持久卷的[动态制备](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/storage/dynamic-provisioning/)功能。

EfficientWatchResumption.description: Allows for storage-originated bookmark (progress notify) events to be delivered to the users. This is only applied to watch operations.
EfficientWatchResumption.x-kab-description-zh: 允许向用户提供面向存储的标签（进度通知）事件。此能力仅限于 watch 操作。

ElasticIndexedJob.description: Allows mutating `spec.completions` for Indexed job when done in tandem with `spec.parallelism`. Specifically, `spec.completions` is mutable if `spec.completions` equals to `spec.parallelism` before and after the update.
ElasticIndexedJob.x-kab-description-zh: 对于就 `spec.parallelism` 而言已经完成的带索引的 Job 而言，允许变更其 `spec.completions` 取值。尤其是在变更前后 `spec.completions` 与 `spec.parallelism` 相同的情况下，即可以变更 `spec.completions` 取值。

EnableAggregatedDiscoveryTimeout.description: Enable the five second timeout on aggregated discovery calls. This is a shortlived feature gate that is deprecated when introduced.
EnableAggregatedDiscoveryTimeout.x-kab-description-zh: 针对聚合的端点发现调用，允许存在 5 秒钟的超时时限。注意，这一门控的生命期很短，在引入的时候即已经被弃用。

EnableEquivalenceClassCache.description: Enable the scheduler to cache equivalence of nodes when scheduling Pods.
EnableEquivalenceClassCache.x-kab-description-zh: 允许调度器在调度 Pod 时使用缓存的节点状态信息。

EndpointSlice.description: Enables EndpointSlices for more scalable and extensible network endpoints.
EndpointSlice.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 EndpointSlice 以支持可扩缩性和可扩展性更好的网络端点。

EndpointSliceNodeName.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 EndpointSlice 的 `nodeName` 字段。

EndpointSliceProxying.description: When enabled, kube-proxy running on Linux will use EndpointSlices as the primary data source instead of Endpoints, enabling scalability and performance improvements. See [Enabling Endpoint Slices](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/enabling-endpointslices/).
EndpointSliceProxying.x-kab-description-zh: 启用此特性之后，Linux 系统上的 `kube-proxy` 会使用 EndpointSlice 而不是 Endpoints 作为主要的数据源，从而提升可扩缩性和性能。参见[启用端点切片](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/enabling-endpointslices/)。

EndpointSliceTerminatingCondition.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 EndpointSlice 的 `terminating` 和 `serving` 状况字段。

EphemeralContainers.description: Enable the ability to add ephemeral containers to running Pods.
EphemeralContainers.x-kab-description-zh: 允许向运行中的 Pod 添加临时容器。

EvenPodsSpread.description: Enable Pods to be scheduled evenly across topology domains. See [Pod Topology Spread Constraints](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-topology-spread-constraints/).
EvenPodsSpread.x-kab-description-zh: 允许跨拓扑域调度 Pod。相关细节参阅 [Pod 拓扑分布约束](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-topology-spread-constraints/)。

EventedPLEG.description: Enable support for the kubelet to receive container life cycle events from the container runtime via an extension to CRI. PLEG is an abbreviation for “Pod lifecycle event generator”. For this feature to be useful, you also need to enable support for container lifecycle events in each container runtime running in your cluster. If the container runtime does not announce support for container lifecycle events then the kubelet automatically switches to the legacy generic PLEG mechanism, even if you have this feature gate enabled.
EventedPLEG.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kubelet 通过 CRI 扩展来从容器运行时层接收容器生命周期事件。PLEG 是 “Pod 生命周期生成器（Pod lifecycle event generator）”的缩写。如果要启用此特性，你需要在集群中的每个容器运行时上启用容器生命周期事件支持。如果容器运行时声称无法支持容器生命周期事件，则 kublet 会自动回退到原来的、一般性的 PLEG 机制，即使你启用了此特性门控也是如此。

ExecProbeTimeout.description: Ensure kubelet respects exec probe timeouts.  This feature gate exists in case any of your existing workloads depend on a now-corrected fault where Kubernetes ignored exec probe timeouts. See [readiness probes](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-liveness-readiness-startup-probes/#configure-probes).
ExecProbeTimeout.x-kab-description-zh: 确保 kubelet 能够正确处理 exec 探针的超时设置。此特性门控主要用于处理已有负载认为 Kubernetes 会忽略 exec 探针超时设置的情况。参阅[就绪探针](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-liveness-readiness-startup-probes/#configure-probes)。

ExpandCSIVolumes.description: Enable the expanding of CSI volumes.
ExpandCSIVolumes.x-kab-description-zh: 允许扩充 CSI 卷的容量。

ExpandInUsePersistentVolumes.description: Enable expanding in-use PVCs. See [Resizing an in-use PersistentVolumeClaim](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/#resizing-an-in-use-persistentvolumeclaim).
ExpandInUsePersistentVolumes.x-kab-description-zh: 允许扩充使用中的 PVC 的容量。参阅[改变使用中 PersistentVolumeClaim 的尺寸](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/#resizing-an-in-use-persistentvolumeclaim)。

ExpandPersistentVolumes.description: Enable the expanding of persistent volumes. See [Expanding Persistent Volumes Claims](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/#expanding-persistent-volumes-claims).
ExpandPersistentVolumes.x-kab-description-zh: 允许扩充 PV 卷的容量。参阅[扩充持久卷申领](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/#expanding-persistent-volumes-claims)。

ExpandedDNSConfig.description: Enables the API server and the kubelet to allow up to 32 DNS search paths and up to 2048 characters in the DNS search list.
ExpandedDNSConfig.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 API 服务器和 kubelet 支持至多 32 条 DNS 搜索路径以及在 DNS 搜索列表设置中支持最多 2048 个字符。

ExperimentalCriticalPodAnnotation.description: Enable annotating specific pods as *critical* so that their scheduling is guaranteed. This feature is deprecated by Pod Priority and Preemption as of v1.13.
ExperimentalCriticalPodAnnotation.x-kab-description-zh: 允许为特定的 Pod 添加**关键 Pod**注解，从而使得它们一定会被调度。此特性在 v1.13 中 Pod 优先级与抢占机制替代。

ExperimentalHostUserNamespaceDefaulting.description: Enabling the defaulting user namespace to host. This is for containers that are using other host namespaces, host mounts, or containers that are privileged or using specific non-namespaced capabilities (e.g. `MKNODE`, `SYS_MODULE` etc.). This should only be enabled if user namespace remapping is enabled in the Docker daemon.
ExperimentalHostUserNamespaceDefaulting.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将宿主名字空间作为默认的 user 名字空间。此特性用于使用了其他宿主名字空间、宿主卷挂载的容器，以及特权容器和使用了特殊的不受名字空间约束的权能字设置（例如：`MKNODE`、`SYS_MODULE` 等）的容器。只有在 Docker 守护进程中启用了 user 名字空间重映射的情况下才可以启用此特性门控。

ExternalPolicyForExternalIP.description: Fix a bug where ExternalTrafficPolicy is not applied to Service ExternalIPs.
ExternalPolicyForExternalIP.x-kab-description-zh: 在较老版本中存在 ExternalTrafficPolicy 未被应用到 Service 的外部 IP 的情况。这是一个缺陷。此特性门控主要针对此缺陷。

GCERegionalPersistentDisk.description: Enable the regional PD feature on GCE.
GCERegionalPersistentDisk.x-kab-description-zh: 在 GCE 上启用区域性 PD 特性支持。

GRPCContainerProbe.description: Enables GRPC probe method for liveness probes, readiness probes, or startup probes.
GRPCContainerProbe.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 GRPC 探测方法来实现活跃性探针、就绪态探针或者启动探针。

GenericEphemeralVolume.description: Enables ephemeral, inline volumes that support all features of normal volumes (can be provided by third-party storage vendors, storage capacity tracking, restore from snapshot, etc.).
GenericEphemeralVolume.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用临时的内联卷。这类卷可以支持正常卷的所有特性（可通过第三方存储供应商来制备、支持容量跟踪、可以基于快照来重建等等）。

GracefulNodeShutdown.description: Enables support for graceful shutdown in kubelet.  During a system shutdown, kubelet will attempt to detect the shutdown event and gracefully terminate pods running on the node. See [Graceful Node Shutdown](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/architecture/nodes/#graceful-node-shutdown) for more details.
GracefulNodeShutdown.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 kubelet 对体面节点终止的支持。在系统关闭期间，kubelet 会尝试检测节点关闭事件并体面地终止节点上运行的 Pod。更多细节可参见[体面节点关闭](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/architecture/nodes/#graceful-node-shutdown)。

GracefulNodeShutdownBasedOnPodPriority.description: Enables the kubelet to check Pod priorities when shutting down a node gracefully.
GracefulNodeShutdownBasedOnPodPriority.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kubelet 在体面终止节点时检查 Pod 的优先级。

HPAContainerMetrics.description: Enable the `HorizontalPodAutoscaler` to scale based on metrics from individual containers in target Pods.
HPAContainerMetrics.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 `HorizontalPodAutoscaler` 基于目标 Pod 中各个容器的度量值来采取扩缩动作。

HPAScaleToZero.description: Enables setting `minReplicas` to 0 for `HorizontalPodAutoscaler` resources when using custom or external metrics.
HPAScaleToZero.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 `HorizontalPodAutoscaler` 在使用定制或者外部指标的时候将 `minReplicas` 设置为 0。

HonorPVReclaimPolicy.description: Honor persistent volume reclaim policy when it is `Delete` irrespective of PV-PVC deletion ordering.
HonorPVReclaimPolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 当 PV 卷的回收策略为 `Delete` 时始终维持策略的行为定义，无论 PV 与对应的 PVC 的删除操作先后顺序如何。

HugePageStorageMediumSize.description: Enable support for multiple sizes pre-allocated [huge pages](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/manage-hugepages/scheduling-hugepages/).
HugePageStorageMediumSize.x-kab-description-zh: 启用对预分配的、多尺寸的[巨页](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/manage-hugepages/scheduling-hugepages/)的支持。

HugePages.description: Enable the allocation and consumption of pre-allocated [huge pages](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/manage-hugepages/scheduling-hugepages/).
HugePages.x-kab-description-zh: 允许分配和使用预分配的[巨页](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/manage-hugepages/scheduling-hugepages/)资源。

HyperVContainer.x-kab-description-zh: 为 Windows 容器启用 [Hyper-V 隔离](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/virtualization/windowscontainers/manage-containers/hyperv-container)。

IPTablesOwnershipCleanup.description: This causes kubelet to no longer create legacy iptables rules.
IPTablesOwnershipCleanup.x-kab-description-zh: 启用此特性门控之后，kubelet 不在像之前一样会创建 iptables 规则。

IPv6DualStack.description: Enable dual stack support for IPv6.
IPv6DualStack.x-kab-description-zh: 启用双协议栈能力以支持 IPv6。

IdentifyPodOS.description: Allows the Pod OS field to be specified. This helps in identifying the OS of the pod authoritatively during the API server admission time. In Kubernetes 1.23, the allowed values for the `pod.spec.os.name` are `windows` and `linux`.
IdentifyPodOS.x-kab-description-zh: 允许为 Pod 设置 `os` 字段。此字段有助于确定性地标示 Pod 的操作系统，在 API 服务器上执行准入时使用。在 Kubernetes v1.23 中，`pod.spec.os.name` 可选的取值为 `windows` 和 `linux`。

ImageMaximumGCAge.description: Enables the kubelet configuration field `imageMaximumGCAge`, allowing an administrator to specify the age after which an image will be garbage collected.
ImageMaximumGCAge.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 kubelet 配置字段 `imageMaximumGCAge`，进而允许管理员设置镜像被垃圾回收之前可以存在的时长上限。

ImmutableEphemeralVolumes.description: Allows for marking individual Secrets and ConfigMaps as immutable for better safety and performance.
ImmutableEphemeralVolumes.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将特定的 Secret 和 ConfigMap 标记为不可变更，从而提高系统的安全性和性能。

InPlacePodVerticalScaling.x-kab-description-zh: 允许就地重新设置 Pod 的资源用量（Vertical Scaling）。

InTreePluginAWSUnregister.description: Stops registering the aws-ebs in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers
InTreePluginAWSUnregister.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 和卷控制器中注册 AWS EBS 树内插件。

InTreePluginAzureDiskUnregister.description: Stops registering the azuredisk in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers
InTreePluginAzureDiskUnregister.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 和卷控制器中注册 AzureDisk 树内插件。

InTreePluginAzureFileUnregister.description: Stops registering the azurefile in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers
InTreePluginAzureFileUnregister.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 和卷控制器中注册 AzureFile 树内插件。

InTreePluginGCEUnregister.description: Stops registering the gce-pd in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers
InTreePluginGCEUnregister.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 和卷控制器中注册 GCE PD 树内插件。

InTreePluginOpenStackUnregister.description: Stops registering the OpenStack cinder in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers
InTreePluginOpenStackUnregister.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 和卷控制器中注册 OpenStack Cinder 树内插件。

InTreePluginPortworxUnregister.description: Stops registering the Portworx in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers
InTreePluginPortworxUnregister.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 和卷控制器中注册 Portworx 树内插件。

InTreePluginRBDUnregister.description: Stops registering the RBD in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers
InTreePluginRBDUnregister.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 和卷控制器中注册 RBD  树内插件。

InTreePluginvSphereUnregister.description: Stops registering the vSphere in-tree plugin in kubelet and volume controllers
InTreePluginvSphereUnregister.x-kab-description-zh: 停止在 kubelet 和卷控制器中注册 vSphere 树内插件。

IndexedJob.description: Allows the Job controllers to manage Pod completions per completion index.
IndexedJob.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 Job 控制其基于完成索引来管理 Pod 的完成情况。

InformerResourceVersion.description: Checks the last synced resource version using the informer.
InformerResourceVersion.x-kab-description-zh: 使用 Informer 机制来检查最后一次同步的资源版本。

IngressClassNamespacedParams.description: Allow namespace-scoped parameters reference in a `IngressClass` resource. This feature adds two fields - `Scope` and `Namespace` to `IngressClass.spec.parameters`.
IngressClassNamespacedParams.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 `IngressClass` 资源中使用名字空间作用域的参数引用。此特性添加在 `IngressClass.spec.parameters` 中添加了 `Scope` 和 `Namespace` 两个字段。

Initializers.description: Allow asynchronous coordination of object creation using the Initializers admission plugin.
Initializers.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 Initializers 准入插件来对对象创建进行异步的协调。

JobBackoffLimitPerIndex.description: Allows users to specify counting of failed Pods per index.
JobBackoffLimitPerIndex.x-kab-description-zh: 允许用户设置每个索引对应的失败 Pod 计数。

JobManagedBy.description: Allows to delegate reconciliation of a Job object to an external controller.
JobManagedBy.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将 Job 对象的调谐委托给外部控制器来处理。

JobMutableNodeSchedulingDirectives.description: Allows updating node scheduling directives in the Pod template of a Job.
JobMutableNodeSchedulingDirectives.x-kab-description-zh: 允许更改 Job 中 Pod 模板内的节点调度指令。

JobPodFailurePolicy.description: Allow users to specify handling of pod failures based on container exit codes and pod conditions.
JobPodFailurePolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 允许用户设置与 Pod 退出代码和 Pod 状况相关的 Pod 失效处理方式。

JobPodReplacementPolicy.description: Allow users to specify recreating Pods of a Job only when Pods have fully terminated.
JobPodReplacementPolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 允许用户设置 Job 只能在 Pod 完全终止之后才能创建 Pod。

JobReadyPods.description: Enables tracking the number of Pods that have a `Ready` condition. The count of `Ready` Pods is recorded in the status of a Job.
JobReadyPods.x-kab-description-zh: 允许跟踪包含 `Ready` 状况的 Pod 的个数。`Ready` 状况的 Pod 个数记录在 Job 的状态字段中。

JobSuccessPolicy.description: Allows users to specify when a Job can be declared as succeeded based on the set of succeeded Pods.
JobSuccessPolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 允许用户设置基于已成功 Pod 的集合合适可以宣布 Job 成功。

JobTrackingWithFinalizers.description: Enables tracking Job completions without relying on Pods remaining in the cluster indefinitely.  The Job controller uses Pod finalizers and a field in the Job status to keep track of the finished Pods to count towards completion.
JobTrackingWithFinalizers.x-kab-description-zh: 允许不基于无限期存在于集群中的 Pod 来判断 Job 完成情况。Job 控制器使用 Pod 终止器（Finalizer）和 Job 状态中的一个字段来跟踪结束的 Pod，统计完成状况。

KMSv1.description: Enables KMS v1 API for encryption at rest. In v1.29, the default is changed to `false`.
KMSv1.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 KVM v1 API 来执行静态数据加密。从 v1.29 开始，默认值改为 `false`。

KMSv2.description: Enables KMS v2 API for encryption at rest.
KMSv2.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 KVM v2 API 来执行静态数据加密。

KMSv2KDF.description: Enables the use of derived encrpytion keys with KMS v2.
KMSv2KDF.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 KVM v2 中使用派生的加密密钥。

KubeProxyDrainingTerminatingNodes.description: Implement connection draining for terminating nodes for `externalTrafficPolicy: Cluster` services.
KubeProxyDrainingTerminatingNodes.x-kab-description-zh: 为 `externalTrafficPolicy: Cluster` 的 Service 在正被终止的节点上实现链接的排空。

KubeletConfigFile.description: Enable loading kubelet configuration from a file specified using a config file. See [setting kubelet parameters via a config file](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/kubelet-config-file/) for more details.
KubeletConfigFile.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kubelet 通过配置文件加载其配置选项。更多细节可参阅[通过配置文件设置 kubelet 参数](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/kubelet-config-file/)。

KubeletCgroupDriverFromCRI.description: Enable detection of the kubelet cgroup driver configuration option from the CRI. The CRI runtime also needs to support this feature in which case the kubelet will ignore the `cgroupDriver` (`--cgroup-driver`) configuration option. If runtime doesn't support it, the kubelet will fallback to using its `cgroupDriver` option.
KubeletCgroupDriverFromCRI.x-kab-description-zh: 允许通过 CRL 来检测 kubelet CGroup 驱动配置选项。CRI 运行时也需要支持这一个选项。如果条件满足，则 kubelet 会忽略 `cgroupDriver` （`--cgroup-driver`）配置选项。如果运行时不支持（条件不满足），则 kubelet 会回退到使用其 `cgroupDriver` 选项配置的行为。

KubeletCredentialProviders.description: Enable kubelet exec credential providers for image pull credentials.
KubeletCredentialProviders.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 kubelet exec 凭据驱动来获得镜像拉取凭据信息。

KubeletInUserNamespace.description: Enables support for running kubelet in a user namespace. See [Running Kubernetes Node Components as a Non-root User](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/kubelet-in-userns/).
KubeletInUserNamespace.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在某个 user 名字空间内运行 kubelet。参见[以非 root 用户运行 Kubernetes 节点组件](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/kubelet-in-userns/)。

KubeletPluginsWatcher.description: Enable probe-based plugin watcher utility to enable kubelet to discover plugins such as [CSI volume drivers](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/volumes/#csi).
KubeletPluginsWatcher.x-kab-description-zh: 启用一个基于探针的插件监视工具，从而允许 kubelet 发现类似于 [CSI 卷驱动](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/storage/volumes/#csi)这类插件。

KubeletPodResources.description: Enable the kubelet's Pod resources gRPC endpoint.
KubeletPodResources.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 kubelet 的 Pod 资源 gRPC 端点。

KubeletPodResourcesDynamicResources.description: Enable POD resources API to return resources allocated by Dynamic Resource Allocation.
KubeletPodResourcesDynamicResources.x-kab-description-zh: 允许通过 Pod 资源 API 返回通过动态资源分配（DRA）所分配的资源。

KubeletPodResourcesGet.description: Enable POD resources API with Get method.
KubeletPodResourcesGet.x-kab-description-zh: 允许通过 GET 动词调用 Pod 资源 API。

KubeletPodResourcesGetAllocatable.description: Enable the kubelet's pod resources `GetAllocatableResources` functionality. With informations about the allocatable resources, clients can properly track the free compute resources on a node.
KubeletPodResourcesGetAllocatable.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kubelet 的 Pod 资源 API `GetAllocatableResources`。有了可分配资源的信息之后，客户端可以正确地跟踪节点上空闲的计算资源。

KubeletSeparateDiskGC.description: Enables Kubelet to garbage collection images/containers on different filesystems.
KubeletSeparateDiskGC.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kubelet 垃圾回收位于不同文件系统上的镜像或容器。

KubeletTracing.description: Add support for distributed tracing in the kubelet. When enabled, kubelet CRI interface and authenticated http servers are instrumented to generate OpenTelemetry trace spans.
KubeletTracing.x-kab-description-zh: 在 kubelet 中为分布式跟踪添加支持。启用此门控之后，kubelet CRI 接口和经过身份认证的 HTTP 服务器会被插桩，以生成 OpenTelemetry 跟踪记录跨度。

LegacyNodeRoleBehavior.description: When disabled, legacy behavior in service load balancers and node disruption will ignore the `node-role.kubernetes.io/master` label in favor of the feature-specific labels provided by `NodeDisruptionExclusion` and `ServiceNodeExclusion`.
LegacyNodeRoleBehavior.x-kab-description-zh: 禁用此门控之后，Service 负载均衡器和节点上的干扰会忽略 `node-role.kubernetes.io/master` 标签，转而使用 `NodeDisruptionExclusion` 和 `ServiceNodeExclusion` 所提供的与相关特性相关的标签。

LegacyServiceAccountTokenCleanup.description: Enables the cleaning up of Secret-based ServiceAccount tokens.
LegacyServiceAccountTokenCleanup.x-kab-description-zh: 允许对基于 Secret 的 ServiceAccount 令牌进行清理。

LegacyServiceAccountTokenNoAutoGeneratio.description: Stop auto-generation of Secret-based service account tokens.
LegacyServiceAccountTokenNoAutoGeneratio.x-kab-description-zh: 停止自动生成基于 Secret 的服务账号令牌。

LegacyServiceAccountTokenTracking.description: Track usage of Secret-based service account tokens.
LegacyServiceAccountTokenTracking.x-kab-description-zh: 跟踪基于 Secret 的呜呜账号令牌的使用情况。

LoadBalancerIPMode.description: Enables the `ipMode` field in the LoadBalancerIngress status of a Service.
LoadBalancerIPMode.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 Service 的 LoadBalancerIngress 中的 `ipMode` 字段。

LocalStorageCapacityIsolation.description: Enable the consumption of local ephemeral storage and also the `sizeLimit` property of an emptyDir volume.
LocalStorageCapacityIsolation.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用本地临时存储，同时允许为 emptyDir 卷设置 `sizeLimit` 属性。

LocalStorageCapacityIsolationFSQuotaMoni.description: When `LocalStorageCapacityIsolation` is enabled for [local ephemeral storage](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-resources-containers/) and the backing filesystem for [emptyDir volumes](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/volumes/#emptydir) supports project quotas and they are enabled, use project quotas to monitor [emptyDir volume](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/volumes/#emptydir) storage consumption rather than filesystem walk for better performance and accuracy.
LocalStorageCapacityIsolationFSQuotaMoni.x-kab-description-zh: 当针对[本地临时存储](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-resources-containers/)启用了 `LocalStorageCapacityIsolation` 特性门控，并且 [emptyDir 卷](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/storage/volumes/#emptydir)所使用的文件系统支持项目配额同时配额也被启用，则可以启用此门控来使用项目配额来监测 emptyDir 卷的存储用量，而不是通过文件系统遍历的方式完成统计，配额监视的方案性能更好且统计信息更准确。

LogarithmicScaleDown.description: Enable semi-random selection of pods to evict on controller scaledown based on logarithmic bucketing of pod timestamps.
LogarithmicScaleDown.x-kab-description-zh: 启用半随机的 Pod 选择机制，以便在基于 Pod 时间戳的指数分组来完成控制器缩容时，选择要驱逐的 Pod。

LoggingAlphaOptions.description: Allow fine-tuning of experimental, alpha-quality logging options.
LoggingAlphaOptions.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用实验性质的、Alpha 级别的日志机制选项。

LoggingBetaOptions.description: Allow fine-tuning of experimental, beta-quality logging options.
LoggingBetaOptions.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用实验性质的、Beta 级别的日志机制选项。

MatchLabelKeysInPodAffinity.description: Enables the `matchLabelKeys` and `mismatchLabelKeys` in PodAffinity and PodAntiAffinity.
MatchLabelKeysInPodAffinity.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 PodAffinity 和 PodAntiAffinity 中使用 `matchLabelKeys` 和 `mismatchLabelKeys` 属性。

MatchLabelKeysInPodTopologySpread.description: Enable the `matchLabelKeys` field for Pod topology spread constraints.
MatchLabelKeysInPodTopologySpread.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Pod 拓扑分布约束中使用 `matchLabelKeys` 字段。

MaxUnavailableStatefulSet.description: Enables setting the `maxUnavailable` field for the rolling update strategy of a StatefulSet. The field specifies the maximum number of Pods that can be unavailable during the update.
MaxUnavailableStatefulSet.x-kab-description-zh: 允许为 StatefulSet 的滚动更新策略设置 `maxUnavailable` 字段。该字段用来设置更新期间可以进入不可用状态的 Pod 个数上限。

MemoryManager.description: Allows setting memory affinity for a container based on NUMA topology.
MemoryManager.x-kab-description-zh: 允许基于 NUMA 拓扑结构为容器设置内存亲和性。

MemoryQoS.description: Enable memory protection and usage throttle on pod / container using cgroup v2 memory controller.
MemoryQoS.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 CGroup v2 的内存控制器来为 Pod、容器启用内存保护和用量抑制。

MinDomainsInPodTopologySpread.description: Enable `minDomains` in Pod topology spread constraints.
MinDomainsInPodTopologySpread.x-kab-description-zh: 允许为 Pod 拓扑分布约束设置 `minDomains`。

MinimizeIPTablesRestore.description: Enables new performance improvement logics in the kube-proxy iptables mode.
MinimizeIPTablesRestore.x-kab-description-zh: 为 iptables 模式下的 kube-proxy 启用一些性能提升逻辑。

MixedProtocolLBService.description: Enable using different protocols in the same `LoadBalancer` type Service instance.
MixedProtocolLBService.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在同一个 `LoadBalancer` 类型的 Service 实例中使用不同的协议。

MountContainers.description: Enable using utility containers on host as the volume mounter.
MountContainers.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用宿主上的工具容器作为卷挂载工具。

MountPropagation.description: Enable sharing volume mounted by one container to other containers or Pods.
MountPropagation.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将一个容器所挂载的卷分享给另一个容器或者别的 Pod。

MultiCIDRRangeAllocator.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 MultiCIDR 范围分配器。

MultiCIDRServiceAllocator.description: Enables the dynamic configuration of Service IP ranges.
MultiCIDRServiceAllocator.x-kab-description-zh: 启用对 Service IP 范围的动态配置。

MutatingAdmissionPolicy.description: Enables the MutatingAdmissionPolicy in admission chain.
MutatingAdmissionPolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 启用准入插件链中的 MutatingAdmissionPolicy。

NFTablesProxyMode.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 `--mode nftables` 选项来运行 kube-proxy 组件。

NamespaceDefaultLabelName.description: Configure the API Server to set an immutable label `kubernetes.io/metadata.name` on all namespaces, containing the namespace name.
NamespaceDefaultLabelName.x-kab-description-zh: 配置 API 服务器在所有名字空间上设置一个不可变更的 `kubernetes.io/metadata.name` 标签，其取值为名字空间的名称。

NetworkPolicyEndPort.description: Enable use of the field `endPort` in NetworkPolicy objects, allowing the selection of a port range instead of a single port.
NetworkPolicyEndPort.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 NetworkPolicy 对象上使用 `endPort` 字段，从而选则一个端口范围而不是仅仅是一个端口。

NetworkPolicyStatus.description: Enable the `status` subresource for NetworkPolicy objects.
NetworkPolicyStatus.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 NetworkPolicy 对象的 `status` 子资源。

NewVolumeManagerReconstruction.description: Robust VolumeManager reconstruction after kubelet restart.
NewVolumeManagerReconstruction.x-kab-description-zh: 启用鲁棒的 VolumeManager 重建机制，处理 kubelet 重启的情况。

NodeDisruptionExclusion.description: Enable use of the Node label `node.kubernetes.io/exclude-disruption` which prevents nodes from being evacuated during zone failures.
NodeDisruptionExclusion.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 `node.kubernetes.io/exclude-disruption` Node 标签，避免在可用区出问题时腾空节点。

NodeInclusionPolicyInPodTopologySpread.description: Enable using `nodeAffinityPolicy` and `nodeTaintsPolicy` in Pod topology spread constraints when calculating pod topology spread skew.
NodeInclusionPolicyInPodTopologySpread.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Pod 拓扑分布约束中使用 `nodeAffinityPolicy` 和 `nodeTaintsPolicy`，计算 Pod 拓扑分布偏差。

NodeLease.description: Enable the new Lease API to report node heartbeats, which could be used as a node health signal.
NodeLease.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 Lease API 来报告节点心跳，进而评估节点健康状况。

NodeLogQuery.description: Enables querying logs of node services using the `/logs` endpoint.
NodeLogQuery.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 `/logs` 端点来查询节点上服务的日志。

NodeOutOfServiceVolumeDetach.description: When a Node is marked out-of-service using the `node.kubernetes.io/out-of-service` taint, Pods on the node will be forcefully deleted if they can not tolerate this taint, and the volume detach operations for Pods terminating on the node will happen immediately. The deleted Pods can recover quickly on different nodes.
NodeOutOfServiceVolumeDetach.x-kab-description-zh: 当使用 `node.kubernetes.io/out-of-service` 这一污点来标记某个 Node 无法提供服务时，节点上的 Pod 如果不能容忍该污点，会被强制删除，同时针对 Pod 的存储卷断联操作也会马上启动。被删除的 Pod 可以在其他节点上快速恢复运行。

NodeSwap.description: Enable the kubelet to allocate swap memory for Kubernetes workloads on a node. Must be used with `KubeletConfiguration.failSwapOn` set to false.  For more details, please see [swap memory](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/architecture/nodes/#swap-memory).
NodeSwap.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kubelet 在节点上为 Kubernetes 负载分配交换内存。启用此门控时必须将 `KubeletConfiguration.failSwapOn` 设置为 false。相关的细节可参阅[交换内存](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/architecture/nodes/#swap-memory)。

NonPreemptingPriority.description: Enable `preemptionPolicy` field for PriorityClass and Pod.
NonPreemptingPriority.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 PriorityClass 和 Pod 上的 `preemptionPolicy` 字段。

OpenAPIEnums.description: Enables populating 'enum' fields of OpenAPI schemas in the spec returned from the API server.
OpenAPIEnums.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在从 API 服务器所返回的 OpenAPI 模式数据中包含 `enum` 字段。

OpenAPIV3.description: Enable Kubernetes to publish OpenAPI v3.
OpenAPIV3.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 Kubernetes 发布 OpenAPI v3 模式定义。

PDBUnhealthyPodEvictionPolicy.description: Enables the `unhealthyPodEvictionPolicy` field of a PodDisruptionBudget. This specifies when unhealthy pods should be considered for eviction.
PDBUnhealthyPodEvictionPolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 PodDisruptionBudget 的 `unhealthyPodEvictionPolicy` 字段。此字段用来设置驱逐 Pod 时如何选择不健康的 Pod。

PVCProtection.description: Enable the prevention of a PersistentVolumeClaim (PVC) from being deleted when it is still used by any Pod. Evolved into the `StorageObjectInUseProtection` gate in v1.10.
PVCProtection.x-kab-description-zh: 启用此特性之后，当某个 PersistentVolumeClaim（PVC）仍然被某 Pod 使用时，该 PVC 无法被删除。从 v1.10 之后更名为 `StorageObjectInUseProtection`。

PersistentLocalVolumes.description: Enable the usage of `local` volume type in Pods.  Pod affinity has to be specified if requesting a `local` volume.
PersistentLocalVolumes.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Pod 使用 `local` 类型的存储卷。如果请求 `local` 卷，则必须为 Pod 设置亲和性属性。

PersistentVolumeLastPhaseTransitionTime.description: Adds a new field to persistent voluems which holds a timestamp of when the volume last transitioned its phase
PersistentVolumeLastPhaseTransitionTime.x-kab-description-zh: 此门控为 PersistentVolume（PV）添加一个新的字段，记录该卷最近进入其当前阶段时的时间戳。

PodAffinityNamespaceSelector.description: Enable the Pod affinity namespace selector and CrossNamespacePodAffinity quota scope features.
PodAffinityNamespaceSelector.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 Pod 亲和性名字空间选择算符以及 CrossNamespacePodAffinity 配额作用域特性。

PodAndContainerStatsFromCRI.description: Configure the kubelet to gather container and pod stats from the CRI container runtime rather than gathering them from cAdvisor.
PodAndContainerStatsFromCRI.x-kab-description-zh: 配置 kubelet 从 CRI 容器运行时获得容器和 Pod 的状态信息，而不是从 cAdvisor 处收集。

PodDeletionCost.description: Enable the [Pod Deletion Cost](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/replicaset/#pod-deletion-cost) feature which allows users to influence ReplicaSet downscaling order.
PodDeletionCost.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 [Pod 删除开销](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/replicaset/#pod-deletion-cost)特性，从而允许用户干预 ReplicaSet 缩容时的处理顺序。

PodDisruptionConditions.description: Enables support for appending a dedicated Pod condition indicating that the Pod is being deleted due to a disruption.
PodDisruptionConditions.x-kab-description-zh: 允许为 Pod 添加一个单独的状况字段，用来表示 Pod 是因为受到干扰而被删除。

PodHasNetworkCondition.description: Enable the kubelet to mark the [PodHasNetwork](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle/#pod-has-network) condition on Pods. This gate is renamed to `PodReadyToStartContainersCondition` in 1.28.
PodHasNetworkCondition.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kubelet 在 Pod 上记录 [PodHasNetwork](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle/#pod-has-network) 状况。此门控在 v1.28 中更名为 `PodReadyToStartContainersCondition`。

PodHostIPs.description: Add `hostIPs` to the status of Pods and related downloard APIs.
PodHostIPs.x-kab-description-zh: 向 Pod 的状态字段以及相关的下行 API 中添加 `hostIPs` 字段。

PodIndexLabel.description: Set Pod completion index as a Pod label for indexed Jobs.
PodIndexLabel.x-kab-description-zh: 对于带索引的 Job，将 Pod 完成索引记录为 Pod 的标签。

PodLifecycleSleepAction.description: Enable SleepAction in container lifecycle hooks.
PodLifecycleSleepAction.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在容器生命周期回调中使用 SleepAction。

PodOverhead.description: Enable the [PodOverhead](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/pod-overhead/) feature to account for pod overheads.
PodOverhead.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 [PodOverhead](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/pod-overhead/) 特性，以便考虑 Pod 的额外资源开销。

PodPriority.description: Enable the descheduling and preemption of Pods based on their [priorities](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/configuration/pod-priority-preemption/).
PodPriority.x-kab-description-zh: 允许基于 Pod 的[优先级](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/configuration/pod-priority-preemption/)来决定取消 Pod 调度或者抢占 Pod。

PodReadinessGates.description: Enable the setting of `podReadinessGate` field for extending Pod readiness evaluation.  See [Pod readiness gate](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle/#pod-readiness-gate) for more details.
PodReadinessGates.x-kab-description-zh: 允许为 Pod 设置 `podReadinessGate` 字段，以便扩展对 Pod 就绪态的评估机制。更多细节可参见 [Pod 就绪门控](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle/#pod-readiness-gate)。

PodReadyToStartContainersCondition.description: Enable the kubelet to mark the Pod ready to start containers condition on Pods. This gate was called `PodHasNetworkCondtion` before 1.28.
允许 kubelet 更改 Pod 上的状况字段以表明 Pod 已经为启动容器准备就绪。此门控在 v1.28 之前称作 `PodHasNetworkCondtion`。

PodSchedulingReadiness.description: Enable setting `schedulingGates` field to control a Pod's [scheduling readiness](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/pod-scheduling-readiness).
PodSchedulingReadiness.x-kab-description-zh: 允许为 Pod 设置 `schedulingGates` 字段以控制 Pod 的[调度就绪状态](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/pod-scheduling-readiness)。

PodSecurity.description: Enables the `PodSecurity` admission plugin as an alternative to `PodSecurityPolicy`.
PodSecurity.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 `PodSecurity` 准入插件，作为早期 `PodSecurityPolicy` 资源的替代机制。

PodShareProcessNamespace.description: Enable the setting of `shareProcessNamespace` in a Pod for sharing a single process namespace between containers running in a pod.  More details can be found in [share process namespace between containers in a Pod](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/share-process-namespace/).
PodShareProcessNamespace.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Pod 中设置 `shareProcessNamespace` 以便在 Pod 内运行的各个容器之间共享相同的进程名字空间。更多的细节可参阅[在 Pod 内容器间共享进程名字空间](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/share-process-namespace/)。

PortForwardWebsockets.description: Enables PortForward to be proxied with a WebSocket client.
PortForwardWebsockets.x-kab-description-zh: 允许通过 WebSocket 客户端转发 PortForward 请求。

PreferNominatedNode.description: This flag tells the scheduler whether the nominated nodes will be checked first before looping through all the other nodes in the cluster.
PreferNominatedNode.x-kab-description-zh: 此门控通知调度器是否在巡视集群中其他节点之前先查看被提名的节点。

ProbeTerminationGracePeriod.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Pod 上[设置探针级别的 `terminationGracePeriodSeconds` 字段](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-liveness-readiness-startup-probes/#probe-level-terminationGracePeriodSeconds)。

ProcMountType.description: Enables control over the type proc mounts for containers by setting the `procMount` field of a SecurityContext.
ProcMountType.x-kab-description-zh: 允许通过设置 SecurityContext 中的 `procMount` 字段来控制容器的 proc 文件系统挂载类型。

ProxyTerminatingEndpoints.description: Enable the `kube-proxy` to handle terminating endpoints when `ExternalTrafficPolicy=Local`
ProxyTerminatingEndpoints.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 `kube-proxy` 在 `ExternalTrafficPolicy=Local` 的情况下处理被终止的端点。

QOSReserved.description: Allows resource reservations at the QoS level preventing pods at lower QoS levels from bursting into resources requested at higher QoS levels (memory only for now).
QOSReserved.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 QoS 级别预留资源，进而避免 QoS 级别较低的 Pod 负载飙升导致影响高 QoS 级别的 Pod 所请求的资源（目前仅支持内存）。

ReadWriteOncePod.description: Enables the usage of `ReadWriteOncePod` PersistentVolume access mode.
ReadWriteOncePod.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 PersistentVolume 的访问模式中使用 `ReadWriteOncePod` 模式。

RecoverVolumeExpansionFailure.description: Enables users to edit their PVCs to smaller sizes so as they can recover from previously issued volume expansion failures. See [Recovering from Failure when Expanding Volumes](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/#recovering-from-failure-when-expanding-volumes).
RecoverVolumeExpansionFailure.x-kab-description-zh: 允许用户编辑其 PVC 资源，使之尺寸变小，进而能够从之前的卷扩容失败问题中恢复。参阅[卷扩容时的失效恢复](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/#recovering-from-failure-when-expanding-volumes)。

RecursiveReadOnlyMounts.x-kab-description-zh: 允许以递归形式完成只读卷的挂载。

RelaxedEnvironmentVariableValidation.description: Allow amost all printable ASCII characters in environment variables.
RelaxedEnvironmentVariableValidation.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在容器环境变量中使用几乎所有的可打印 ASCII 字符。

RemainingItemCount.description: Allow the API servers to show a count of remaining items in the response to a chunked list request.
RemainingItemCount.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 API 服务器在分块列表请求的响应中给出剩余条目的数目。

RemoveSelfLink.description: Deprecates and removes `selfLink` from ObjectMeta and ListMeta.
RemoveSelfLink.x-kab-description-zh: 弃用并删除 ObjectMeta 和 ListMeta 中的 `selfLink` 字段。

RequestManagement.description: Enables managing request concurrency with prioritization and fairness at each API server. Deprecated by `APIPriorityAndFairness` since v1.17.
RequestManagement.x-kab-description-zh: 在各个 API 服务器上通过优先级与公平性机制管理请求的并发度。从 v1.17 开始被 `APIPriorityAndFairness` 门控替代。

ResourceLimitsPriorityFunction.description: Enable a scheduler priority function that assigns a lowest possible score of 1 to a node that satisfies at least one of the input Pod's cpu and memory limits. The intent is to break ties between nodes with same scores.
ResourceLimitsPriorityFunction.x-kab-description-zh: 启用调度器中的某个优先级计算函数，为能够至少满足新 Pod CPU 和内存限制之一的节点赋值，该值为最小可能性值 1。这一赋值可以进一步区分原来可能得分相同的节点。

ResourceQuotaScopeSelectors.x-kab-description-zh: 启用资源配额作用域选择算符。

RetroactiveDefaultStorageClass.description: Allow assigning StorageClass to unbound PVCs retroactively.
RetroactiveDefaultStorageClass.x-kab-description-zh: 允许通过反射机制为未被绑定的 PVC 赋予 StorageClass 值。

RetryGenerateName.description: Resource create requests using `generateName` are retried automatically by the API server if the generated name conflicts with an existing resource name, up to a maximum number of 7 retries.
RetryGenerateName.x-kab-description-zh: 对于设置了 `generateName` 的资源创建请求，如果所生成的资源名称与现有资源发生冲突，API 服务器会自动重试。重试次数上限为 7。

RootCAConfigMap.description: Configure the `kube-controller-manager` to publish a ConfigMap named `kube-root-ca.crt` to every namespace. This ConfigMap contains a CA bundle used for verifying connections to the kube-apiserver.
RootCAConfigMap.x-kab-description-zh: 配置 `kube-controller-manager` 向所有名字空间发布名为 `kube-root-ca.crt` 的 ConfigMap。此 ConfigMap 包含一个 CA 证书包，可供检查与 kube-apiserver 之间的连接。

RotateKubeletClientCertificate.description: Enable the rotation of the client TLS certificate on the kubelet.
RotateKubeletClientCertificate.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 kubelet 中对客户端 TLS 证书进行轮换。

RotateKubeletServerCertificate.description: Enable the rotation of the server TLS certificate on the kubelet.
RotateKubeletServerCertificate.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 kubelet 中对服务器端 TLS 证书进行轮换。

RunAsGroup.description: Enable control over the primary group ID set on the init processes of containers.
RunAsGroup.x-kab-description-zh: 允许控制容器中 init 进程的主 Group ID。

RuntimeClass.description: Enable the [RuntimeClass](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/containers/runtime-class/) feature for selecting container runtime configurations.
RuntimeClass.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 [RuntimeClass](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/containers/runtime-class/) 特性以支持选择容器运行时配置。

RuntimeClassInImageCriApi.description: Adds support to pull images based on the runtime class specified.

SCTPSupport.description: Enables the SCTP `protocol` value in Pod, Service, Endpoints, EndpointSlice, and NetworkPolicy definitions.
SCTPSupport.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Pod、Service、Endpoints、EndpointSlice 和 NetworkPolicy 定义中将 `protocol` 值设置为 "SCTP"。

SELinuxMount.description: Speed up container startup by mounting volumes with the correct SELinux label instead of changing each file on the volumes recursively
SELinuxMount.x-kab-description-zh: 通过使用正确的 SELinux 标签来挂载卷而不是递归地更改卷中文件来加速容器启动过程。

SELinuxMountReadWriteOncePod.description: Allows kubelet to mount volumes for a Pod directly with the right SELinux label instead of applying the SELinux label recursively on every file on the volume. The initial implementation focused on ReadWriteOncePod volumes.
SELinuxMountReadWriteOncePod.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kubelet 使用正确的 SELinux 标签来直接为 Pod 挂载卷，而不是递归地将 SELinux 标签应用到卷中每个文件之上。初始的实现关注 ReadWriteOncePod 模式的卷。

ScheduleDaemonSetPods.description: Enable DaemonSet Pods to be scheduled by the default scheduler instead of the DaemonSet controller.
ScheduleDaemonSetPods.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用默认的调度器来调度 DaemonSet Pod，而不是使用 DaemonSet 控制器来完成调度。

SchedulerQueueingHints.description: Enables the scheduler's enhancement called QueueingHints, which benefits to reduce the useless requeueing.
SchedulerQueueingHints.x-kab-description-zh: 启用名为 QueueingHints 的调度器改进，从而减少不必要的重排队现象。

SeccompDefault.description: Enables the use of `RuntimeDefault` as the default seccomp profile for all workloads. The seccomp profile is specified in the `securityContext` of a Pod and/or a Container.
SeccompDefault.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将 `RuntimeDefault` 设置为所有工作负载的默认 Seccomp 配置。Seccomp 配置是通过 Pod 与/或 Container 的 `securityContext` 来设置的。

SecurityContextDeny.description: This gate signals that the SecurityContextDeny admission controller is deprecated.
SecurityContextDeny.x-kab-description-zh: 此门控表示 SecurityContextDeny 准入控制器已被弃用。

SelectorIndex.description: Allows label and field based indexes in API server watch cache to accelerate list operations.
SelectorIndex.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 API 服务器的监视缓存（Watch Cache）中基于标签和字段生成索引，进而提升 list 操作的效率。

SeparateCacheWatchRPC.description: Allow watch cache to create a watch on a dedicated RPC. This prevents watch cache from being starved by other watches.
SeparateCacheWatchRPC.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 API 服务器中监视缓存（Watch Cache）通过专用的 RPC 通道来执行监视操作。这一增强可以避免监视缓存被其他 watch 操作耗尽。

SeparateTaintEvictionController.description: Decouples taint eviction controller, performing taint-based Pod eviction, from Node lifecycle controller.
SeparateTaintEvictionController.x-kab-description-zh: 将负责基于污点的 Pod 驱逐逻辑的污点驱逐控制器从 Node 生命周期控制器中解耦出来。

ServerSideApply.description: Enables the [Sever Side Apply (SSA)](https://k8s.io/docs/reference/using-api/server-side-apply/) feature on the API Server.
ServerSideApply.x-kab-description-zh: 在 API 服务器上启用[服务器端应用（Sever Side Apply，SSA）](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/reference/using-api/server-side-apply/)。

ServerSideFieldValidation.x-kab-description-zh: 启用服务器端字段合法性检查。

ServiceAccountIssuerDiscovery.description: Enable OIDC discovery endpoints (issuer and JWKS URLs) for the service account issuer in the API server.
ServiceAccountIssuerDiscovery.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 OIDC 发现端点（包括发布者和 JWKS URL 等)，以确定 API 服务器上的服务账号发放者。

ServiceAccountTokenJTI.description: Controls whether JTIs (UUIDs) are embedded into generated service account tokens, and whether these JTIs are recorded into the audit log for future requests made by these tokens.
ServiceAccountTokenJTI.x-kab-description-zh: 此门控用来控制是否将 JTIs (UUIDs) 嵌入到所生成的服务账号令牌中，以及是否将这些令牌所发起的请求对应的 JTI 记录到审计日志中。

ServiceAccountTokenNodeBinding.description: Controls whether the API server supports binding service account tokens to Node objects.
ServiceAccountTokenNodeBinding.x-kab-description-zh: 控制 API 服务器是否支持将服务账号令牌绑定到 Node 对象上。

ServiceAccountTokenNodeBindingValidation.description: Controls whether the API server will validate Node claims in service account tokens.
ServiceAccountTokenNodeBindingValidation.x-kab-description-zh: 控制 API 服务器是否对服务账号令牌中的 Node 声明进行合法性检查。

ServiceAccountTokenPodNodeInfo.description: Controls whether the API server embeds the node name and uid for the associated node when issuing service account tokens bound to Pod objects.
ServiceAccountTokenPodNodeInfo.x-kab-description-zh: 控制是否 API 服务器在发放绑定到 Pod 对象上的服务账号令牌时将相关联的节点的名称与 UID 嵌套到其中。

ServiceAppProtocol.description: Enables the `appProtocol` field on Services and Endpoints.
ServiceAppProtocol.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Service 和 Endpoints 对象上使用 `appProtocol` 字段。

ServiceIPStaticSubrange.description: Enables a strategy for Services ClusterIP allocations, whereby the ClusterIP range is subdivided. Dynamic allocated ClusterIP addresses will be allocated preferently from the upper range allowing users to assign static ClusterIPs from the lower range with a low risk of collision.
ServiceIPStaticSubrange.x-kab-description-zh: 启用一种 Service ClusterIP 分配方案，对 ClusterIP 的范围进行划分。动态分配的 ClusterIP 地址会优先从高地址侧分配，从而允许用户将低端地址范围用于分配静态的 ClusterIP，减少发生冲突的可能性。

ServiceInternalTrafficPolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Service 对象上设置 `internalTrafficPolicy` 字段。

ServiceLBNodePortControl.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 Service 对象上设置 `allocateLoadBalancerNodePorts` 字段。

ServiceLoadBalancerClass.description: Enables the `loadBalancerClass` field on Services. See [specifying class of load balancer implementation](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/service/#specifying-class-of-load-balancer-implementation-load-balancer-class) for more details.
ServiceLoadBalancerClass.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 Service 资源上的 `loadBalancerClass` 字段。更多细节可参阅[设置负载均衡器实现的类信息](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/services-networking/service/#specifying-class-of-load-balancer-implementation-load-balancer-class)。

ServiceLoadBalancerFinalizer.description: Enable finalizer protection for Service load balancers.
ServiceLoadBalancerFinalizer.x-kab-description-zh: 启用对 Service 负载均衡器的终止器（Finalizer）保护机制。

ServiceNodeExclusion.description: Enable the exclusion of nodes from load balancers created by a cloud provider. A node is eligible for exclusion if labelled with "`node.kubernetes.io/exclude-from-external-load-balancers`".
ServiceNodeExclusion.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将节点排除在云平台所创建的负载均衡器之外。当 Node 上带有 "`node.kubernetes.io/exclude-from-external-load-balancers`" 标签时，对应节点可以被排除。

ServiceNodePortStaticSubrange.description: Subdivide the NodePort range for dynamic and static port allocation.
ServiceNodePortStaticSubrange.x-kab-description-zh: 对 NodePort 范围进行划分，以便支持静态和动态端口分配。

ServiceTopology.description: Enable service to route traffic based upon the Node topology of the cluster. See [ServiceTopology](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/service-topology/) for more details.
ServiceTopology.x-kab-description-zh: 允许服务基于集群中节点的拓扑分布来对请求流量进行路由。相关细节可参阅[ServiceTopology](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/services-networking/service-topology/)。

ServiceTrafficDistribution.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 Service 的 `trafficDistribution` 字段。

SetHostnameAsFQDN.description: Enable setting Fully Qualified Domain Name(FQDN) as the hostname of a pod by specifying its `setHostnameFQDN` field.
SetHostnameAsFQDN.x-kab-description-zh: 允许通过设置 `setHostnameFQDN` 字段来将全限定域名（Fully Qualified Domain Name，FQDN）作为 Pod 的主机名。

SidecarContainers.description: Introduces sidecar containers, a new type of init container that starts before other containers but remains running for the full duration of the Pod's lifecycle and will not block pod termination.
SidecarContainers.x-kab-description-zh: 引入边车容器（Sidecar Container），一种新型的 Init 容器，能够在其他容器之前启动并且在 Pod 的整个生命周期内保持运行状态，但不会阻塞 Pod 的终止行为。

SizeMemoryBackedVolumes.description: Enable kubelets to determine the size limit for memory-backed volumes (mainly `emptyDir` volumes).
SizeMemoryBackedVolumes.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kubelet 确定用内存来提供的卷（主要是 `emptyDir` 卷）的尺寸约束。

SkipReadOnlyValidationGCE.description: Skip validation enable in next version. (Incorrectly marked as 1.26 in source code)
SkipReadOnlyValidationGCE.x-kab-description-zh: 在下一个版本中略过合法性检查。（此门控在 1.26 中状态标记错误）。

StableLoadBalancerNodeSet.description: Enables less load balancer re-configurations by the service controller (KCCM) as an effect of changing node state.
StableLoadBalancerNodeSet.x-kab-description-zh: 允许减少 Service 控制器因为节点状态变化而执行的负载均衡重配置操作。

StartupProbe.description: Enable the [startup](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle/#when-should-you-use-a-startup-probe) probe in the kubelet.
StartupProbe.x-kab-description-zh: 在 kubelet 中启用[启动探针](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/pod-lifecycle/#when-should-you-use-a-startup-probe)。

StatefulSetAutoDeletePVC.description: Enables polices controlling the deletion of PVCs created by a StatefulSet.
StatefulSetAutoDeletePVC.x-kab-description-zh: 允许通过策略来控制如何删除由 StatefulSet 所创建的 PVC。

StatefulSetMinReadySeconds.description: Allows `minReadySeconds` to be respected by the StatefulSet controller.
StatefulSetMinReadySeconds.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 StatefulSet 遵从 `minReadySeconds` 设置。

StatefulSetStartOrdinal.description: Allow configuration of the start ordinal in a StatefulSet. See [Start ordinal](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/statefulset/#start-ordinal) for more details.
StatefulSetStartOrdinal.x-kab-description-zh: 允许控制 StatefulSet 中的启动顺序。更多细节可参阅[启动顺序](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/statefulset/#start-ordinal)。

StorageNamespaceIndex.description: Allows namespace indexer for namespace scoped resources in API server cache to accelerate list operations.
StorageNamespaceIndex.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 API 服务器的缓存中对名字空间作用域的资源生成名字空间索引，目的是为 list 操作提速。

StorageObjectInUseProtection.description: Postpone the deletion of PersistentVolume or PersistentVolumeClaim objects if they are still being used.
StorageObjectInUseProtection.x-kab-description-zh: 如果 PersistentVolume 或 PersistentVolumeClaim 对象仍在被使用状态，则推迟其删除操作。

StorageVersionHash.description: Allow API servers to expose the storage version hash in the discovery.
StorageVersionHash.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 API 服务器在服务发现信息中公开存储版本哈希值。

StorageVersionMigrator.x-kab-description-zh: 启用对 StorageVersionMigrator 的支持。

StreamingProxyRedirects.description: Instructs the API server to intercept (and follow) redirects from the backend (kubelet) for streaming requests. Examples of streaming requests include the `exec`, `attach` and `port-forward` requests.
StreamingProxyRedirects.x-kab-description-zh: 指示 API 服务器拦截（并跟踪）来自后端（主要是 kubelet）的重定向流数据请求。流数据请求的例子包括 `exec`、`attach`、`port-forward` 等请求。

StructuredAuthenticationConfiguration.description: Enables structured authentication configuration so that users can use any JWT-compliant tokens in addition to OIDC tokens. Multiple providers can be used simultaneously.
StructuredAuthenticationConfiguration.x-kab-description-zh: 启用结构化的身份认证配置，从而使得用户可以使用任何与 JWT 兼容的令牌而不仅仅是 OIDC 令牌。用户可以同时使用多个认证驱动。

StructuredAuthorizationConfiguration.description: Enables structured authorization configuration, which can enhances the manageability and traceability for authorization than RBAC.
StructuredAuthorizationConfiguration.x-kab-description-zh: 启用结构化的鉴权配置，目的是与 RBAC 相比提高鉴权的可管理和可跟踪性。

SupportIPVSProxyMode.description: Enable providing in-cluster service load balancing using IPVS.
SupportIPVSProxyMode.x-kab-description-zh: 允许使用 IPVS 来提供集群内的服务负载均衡服务。

SupportNodePidsLimit.description: Enable the support to limiting PIDs on the Node.  The parameter `pid=<number>` in the `--system-reserved` and `--kube-reserved` options can be specified to ensure that the specified number of process IDs will be reserved for the system as a whole and for Kubernetes system daemons respectively.
SupportNodePidsLimit.x-kab-description-zh: 允许限制节点上的 PID 用量。`--system-reserved` 和 `--kube-reserved` 命令行选项中的 `pid=<数字>` 参数可以分别被设置来确保整个系统和 Kubernetes 守护进程都有给定数量的进程 ID 被预留。

SupportPodPidsLimit.description: Enable the support to limiting PIDs in Pods.
SupportPodPidsLimit.x-kab-description-zh: 允许限制 Pod 中对 PID 的用量。

SuspendJob.description: Enable support to suspend and resume Jobs.
SuspendJob.x-kab-description-zh: 允许支持挂起和恢复 Job 对象。

Sysctls.description: Enable support for namespaced kernel parameters (sysctls) that can be set for each Pod.
Sysctls.x-kab-description-zh: 启用带名字空间的内核参数（sysctls）支持，这些参数可以针对各个 Pod 设置。

TTLAfterFinished.description: Allow a [TTL controller](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/ttlafterfinished/) to clean up resources after they finish execution.
TTLAfterFinished.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 [TTL 控制器](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/ttlafterfinished/)来清理完成执行的资源。

TaintBasedEvictions.description: Enable evicting pods from nodes based on taints on Nodes and tolerations on Pods.
TaintBasedEvictions.x-kab-description-zh: 允许根据节点上的污点以及 Pod 上设置的容忍度来将 Pod 驱离节点。

TaintNodesByCondition.description: Enable automatic tainting nodes based on node conditions.
TaintNodesByCondition.x-kab-description-zh: 允许根据节点的状况值来自动为节点添加污点。

TokenRequest.description: Enable the `TokenRequest` endpoint on service account resources.
TokenRequest.x-kab-description-zh: 为 ServiceAccount 资源启用 `TokenRequest` 端点。

TokenRequestProjection.description: Enable the injection of service account tokens into a Pod through a [`projected` volume](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/volumes/#projected).
