TokenRequestProjection.x-kab-description-zh: 允许通过 [`projected` 卷](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/storage/volumes/#projected) 将服务账号令牌注入到 Pod 中。

TopologyAwareHints.description: Enables topology aware routing based on topology hints in EndpointSlices. See [Topology Aware Hints](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/topology-aware-hints/) for more details.
TopologyAwareHints.x-kab-description-zh: 允许基于 EndpointSlice 中的拓扑提示信息来执行拓扑感知的路由。相关细节可参阅[拓扑感知提示](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/topology-aware-hints/)。

TopologyManager.description: Enable a mechanism to coordinate fine-grained hardware resource assignments for different components in Kubernetes. See [Control Topology Management Policies on a node](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/topology-manager/).
TopologyManager.x-kab-description-zh: 启用一种协调机制，为不同的 Kubernetes 组件处理细粒度的硬件资源分配。参阅[控制节点上拓扑管理策略](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/topology-manager/)。

TopologyManagerPolicyAlphaOptions.description: Allow fine-tuning of topology manager policies, experimental, Alpha-quality options. This feature gate guards *a group* of topology manager options whose quality level is alpha. This feature gate will never graduate to beta or stable.
TopologyManagerPolicyAlphaOptions.x-kab-description-zh: 允许对拓扑管理器的策略进行微调，主要针对一些实验性质的、Alpha 质量级别的选项。此特性用来保护一些 Alpha 级别的拓扑管理策略选项。此门控不会晋级到 Beta 或 GA 阶段。

TopologyManagerPolicyBetaOptions.description: Allow fine-tuning of topology manager policies, experimental, Beta-quality options. This feature gate guards *a group* of topology manager options whose quality level is beta. This feature gate will never graduate to stable.
TopologyManagerPolicyBetaOptions.x-kab-description-zh: 允许对拓扑管理器的策略进行微调，主要针对一些实验性质的、Beta 质量级别的选项。此特性用来保护一些 Beta 级别的拓扑管理策略选项。此门控不会晋级到 Beta 或 GA 阶段。

TopologyManagerPolicyOptions.description: Allow fine-tuning of topology manager policies,
TopologyManagerPolicyOptions.x-kab-description-zh: 允许对拓扑管理器的策略进行微调。

TranslateStreamCloseWebsocketRequests.description: Enables StreamTranslator proxy to handle WebSockets upgrade requests for the version of the RemoteCommand subprotocol that supports the `close` signal.
TranslateStreamCloseWebsocketRequests.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 StreamTranslator 代理来处理 WebSockets 连接升级请求，具体取决于支持 `close` 信号的 RemoteCommand 子协议的版本。

UnauthenticatedHTTP2DOSMitigation.description: Enables http2 DOS mitigations for unauthenticated clients.
UnauthenticatedHTTP2DOSMitigation.x-kab-description-zh: 允许对未通过身份认证的客户端执行 http2 DOS 防范措施。

UnknownVersionInteroperabilityProxy.description: Proxies client to an apiserver capable of serving the request in the event of version skew.
UnknownVersionInteroperabilityProxy.x-kab-description-zh: 在 API 服务器之间存在版本偏差时，将客户端的请求代理到能够提供服务的 API 服务器上。

UserNamespacesPodSecurityStandards.description: Enables user namespace support for PodSecurityStandards. Enabling this feature will modify all Pod Security Standard rules to allow setting `spec[.*].securityContext.[runAsNonRoot,runAsUser]`. This feature gate should only be enabled if all nodes in the cluster support the user namespace feature and have it enabled. The feature gate will not graduate or be enabled by default in future Kubernetes releases.
UserNamespacesPodSecurityStandards.x-kab-description-zh: 为 PodSecurityStandards 启用用户名字空间。启用此特性可以更改所有 PodSecurityStandard 规则，进而允许用户设置 `spec[.*].securityContext.[runAsNonRoot,runAsUser]`。此特性门控只能在集群中所有节点都支持用户名字空间特性并且启用了该特性的时候才能使用。此特性在未来的 Kubernetes 发行版本中不会被提升至下一成熟级别，也不会被默认启用。

UserNamespacesStatelessPodsSupport.description: Enables user namespace support for stateless Pods. This feature is renamed into `UserNamespacesSupport` in 1.28.
UserNamespacesStatelessPodsSupport.x-kab-description-zh: 为无状态 Pod 启用用户名字空间支持。在 v1.28 中，此门控被重命名为 `UserNamespacesSupport`。

UserNamespacesSupport.description: Enables user namespace support for Pods. This feature was called `UserNamespacesStatelessPodsSupport` before 1.28.
UserNamespacesSupport.x-kab-description-zh: 为 Pod 启用用户名字空间支持。此门控在 v1.28 之前称作 `UserNamespacesStatelessPodsSupport`。

ValidateProxyRedirects.description: This flag controls whether the API server should validate that redirects are only followed to the same host. Only used if the `StreamingProxyRedirects` flag is enabled.
ValidateProxyRedirects.x-kab-description-zh: 此门控控制是否 API 服务器要检查重定向操作仍指向同一主机。只有当 `StreamingProxyRedirects` 被启用时才会被使用。

ValidatingAdmissionPolicy.description: Enable [ValidatingAdmissionPolicy](https://k8s.io/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/validating-admission-policy/) support for CEL validations be used in Admission Control.
ValidatingAdmissionPolicy.x-kab-description-zh: 启用 [ValidatingAdmissionPolicy](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/validating-admission-policy/) 支持，以便在准入控制中使用基于 CEL 表达式的合法性检查。

VolumeAttributeClass.description: Enables user specified volume attributes for persistent volumes, like iops and throughput.
VolumeAttributeClass.x-kab-description-zh: 为持久卷启用用户指定的卷属性支持，例如 IOPS 和吞吐量等。

VolumeCapacityPriority.description: Enable support for prioritizing nodes in different topologies based on available PV capacity.
VolumeCapacityPriority.x-kab-description-zh: 允许基于可用的 PV 容量来对位于不同拓扑域中的节点进行优先级排序。

VolumePVCDataSource.description: Enable support for specifying an existing PVC as a DataSource.
VolumePVCDataSource.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将已有的 PVC 设置为数据源。

VolumeScheduling.description: Enable volume topology aware scheduling and make the PersistentVolumeClaim (PVC) binding aware of scheduling decisions. It also enables the usage of [`local`](https://k8s.io/docs/concepts/storage/volumes/#local) volume type when used together with the `PersistentLocalVolumes` feature gate.
VolumeScheduling.x-kab-description-zh: 启用卷拓扑感知的调度机制，并确保 PVC 绑定能够符合调度决策。此门控也允许在启用了 `PersistentLocalVolumes` 门控时使用 [`local`](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/concepts/storage/volumes/#local) 卷类型。

VolumeSnapshotDataSource.description: Enable volume snapshot data source support.
VolumeSnapshotDataSource.x-kab-description-zh: 启用卷快照数据源支持。

VolumeSubpath.description: Allow mounting a subpath of a volume in a container
VolumeSubpath.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在容器内挂载某个卷的某个子路径。

VolumeSubpathEnvExpansion.description: Enable `subPathExpr` field for expanding environment variables into a `subPath`.
VolumeSubpathEnvExpansion.x-kab-description: 允许使用 `subPathExpr` 字段，以便用扩展后的环境变量值来设置 `subPath` 属性。

WarningHeaders.description: Allow sending warning headers in API responses.
WarningHeaders.x-kab-description-zh: 允许在 API 响应中使用 warning 标头。

WatchBookmark.description: Enable support for watch bookmark events.
WatchBookmark.x-kab-description-zh: 允许支持 watch 操作的 BOOKMARK 事件。

WatchFromStorageWithoutResourceVersion.description: Enables watches without `resourceVersion` to be served from storage.
WatchFromStorageWithoutResourceVersion.x-kab-description-zh: 启用监视操作，但不使用存储中所提供的 `resourceVersion`。

WatchList.description: Allow the API server to stream individual items instead of chunking.
WatchList.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 API 服务器用数据流的方式来发送各个条目而不是按批次来返回。

WatchListClient.description: Allow the client to get a stream of individual items instead of chunking from the server.
WatchListClient.x-kab-description-zh: 允许客户端从服务器接收包含单个条目的数据流，而不是成批的数据块。

WinDSR.description: Allows kube-proxy to create DSR loadbalancers for Windows.
WinDSR.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kube-proxy 为 Windows 创建 DSR 负载均衡器。

WinOverlay.description: Allows kube-proxy to run in overlay mode for Windows.
WinOverlay.x-kab-description-zh: 允许 kube-proxy 在 Windows 上以覆盖网络（Overlay）的形式运行。

WindowsEndpointSliceProxying.description: When enabled, kube-proxy running on Windows will use EndpointSlices as the primary data source instead of Endpoints, enabling scalability and performance improvements. See [Enabling EndpointSlices](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/enabling-endpointslices/).
WindowsEndpointSliceProxying.x-kab-description-zh: 启用了此门控时，Windows 上运行的 kube-proxy 会使用 EndpointSlice 而不是 Endpoints 作为主要的数据源，从而提升系统的可扩缩性和性能。参见[启用 EndpointSlices](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/administer-cluster/enabling-endpointslices/)。

WindowsGMSA.description: Enables passing of GMSA credential specs from pods to container runtimes.
WindowsGMSA.x-kab-description-zh: 允许从 Pod 中将 GMSA 凭据规约传递给容器运行时。

WindowsHostNetwork.description: Enables support for joining Windows containers to a hosts' network namespace.
WindowsHostNetwork.x-kab-description-zh: 允许将 Windows 容器添加到宿主上的网络名字空间中。

WindowsHostProcessContainers.description: Enables support for Windows HostProcess containers.
WindowsHostProcessContainers.x-kab-description-zh: 启用对 Windows HostProcess （主机进程）容器的支持。

WindowsRunAsUserName.description: Enable support for running applications in Windows containers with as a non-default user. See [Configuring RunAsUserName](https://k8s.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-runasusername) for more details.
WindowsRunAsUserName.x-kab-description-zh: 允许以非默认用户账号的身份在 Windows 容器中运行应用。更多细节可参阅[配置 RunAsUserName](https://k8s.io/zh-cn/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-runasusername)。

ZeroLimitedNominalConcurrencyShares.description: Allow Priority & Fairness in the API server to use a zero value for the 'nominalConcurrencyShares' field of the 'limited' section of a priority level.
ZeroLimitedNominalConcurrencyShares.x-kab-description: 允许 API 服务器中的优先级与公平性机制使用零值来设置某优先级别 `limited` 下的 `nominalConcurrencyShares` 字段。

overview:
Feature gates are a set of key=value pairs that describe Kubernetes features. You can turn these features on or off using the `--feature-gates` command line flag on every Kubernetes components or the corresponding flags in their configuration files. For example:

```shell
--feature-gates="...,DynamicKubeletConfig=true"
```
x-kab-description-zh:
特性门控是一组 key=value 偶对，用来描述 Kubernetes 功能特性。用户可以使用各个 Kubernetes 组件的命令行选项 `--feature-gates` 或者其对应的配置文件来设置特性门控。例如：

```shell
--feature-gates="...,DynamicKubeletConfig=true"
```
